manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Redeeming Love: The Companion Study A Path to Redeeming Love Redeeming Love (Movie Tie-In) Venture deeper into the heart of the classic bestselling novel with this six-week study and discover life-changing Bible truths. This forty-day devotional leads you on a personal, six-week journey into God’s all-consuming embrace. Now a major motion picture!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Timeless Tale of Unconditional Love
reviews.reviewText: On my top 5 list this book stands as a monumental work in the landscape of Christian fiction, delivering a powerful retelling of the biblical story of Hosea and Gomer set during the California Gold Rush. This novel transcends mere storytelling, weaving a narrative rich with themes of forgiveness, grace, and the relentless nature of divine love. Rivers transforms a classic tale into an immersive experience, capturing the hearts of readers and leaving an indelible mark on the soul.From the outset, "Redeeming Love" introduces us to Angel, a woman whose life has been shaped by betrayal, hardship, and despair. Her journey is one of stark contrasts, from the depths of hopelessness to the heights of redemption, guided by the unwavering love of Michael Hosea, a man called by God to love her unconditionally. Rivers masterfully portrays the complexities of Angel's resistance and eventual surrender to love, mirroring the human struggle with accepting unmerited grace.What sets "Redeeming Love" apart is not just its compelling narrative but its profound spiritual insights. Rivers delves deep into the essence of God's love for humanity, showcasing it as persistent, patient, and transformative. Through the relationship between Angel and Michael, readers are offered a glimpse into the heart of the gospel, presented in a context that is both relatable and deeply moving.The novel's setting during the California Gold Rush adds layers of authenticity and richness to the story. Rivers' meticulous research is evident in her vivid descriptions of the era, from the bustling streets of mining towns to the untamed beauty of the American West. This backdrop serves as the perfect canvas for a story about finding treasure not in gold but in the human heart transformed by love."Redeeming Love" is also a testament to Rivers' skill as a writer. Her prose is both elegant and accessible, with a narrative pace that enthralls and captivates. Each character is meticulously crafted, their stories interwoven with themes of redemption that resonate with universal appeal. Rivers does not shy away from the darkness in human nature but confronts it with the light of hope, making the story's moments of joy and revelation all the more powerful.In conclusion, "Redeeming Love" is far more than a novel; it is an exploration of the depths of God's redeeming love for each of us. Francine Rivers has created a masterpiece that challenges, comforts, and ultimately inspires. This book is a beacon for anyone searching for a story of hope in the midst of despair, a narrative of a love that overcomes the greatest of obstacles. Whether you're a longtime fan of Christian fiction or a newcomer to Rivers' work, "Redeeming Love" is a must-read, a journey of the heart that will leave you transformed and reaffirmed in the power of redemptive love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my FAVORITE BOOK EVER
reviews.reviewText: I love this book. I read it my first time when I was 22 and fell in love with both characters as well as the setting. Beautifully written. And the religious stuff is really interesting and often times super wholesome and not cringe like you’d expect. A wonderful book for woman with a history of physical/sexual abuse/self sabotaging, to relate to.Purchased the hard cover this past Christmas for a friend of mine. It’s gorgeous. I love the red color.. I’ll have to check in and see how she likes it in a mo or two. 🫶

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful story!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I've read this and fell in love with it all over. The love story is beautiful and you can feel it drawing you close to god. For anyone struggling in faith this is powerful book to help you understand and find feeling and meaning towards knowing the lord! Mrs. Rivers has created a great blessing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great book , author writes so well. I always buy this one to gift to friends to share this authors work 💞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love reading Francine Rivers. I read Redeeming Love years ago, and now I’m studying the book of Hosea and wanted to read her book again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this book wears exceptionally great
reviews.reviewText: Loved it, felt I lived through many of the characters thoughts and feelings and wants. I would most certainly recommend this book to everyone. I also questioned my relationship with God and felt the longing to be closer. Great book indeed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I enjoyed it even more towards the end!
reviews.reviewText: It was a difficult book to read in the beginning because of what Angel was going through. Then it got a bit boring but it picked up and I became hooked! I love these kind of Christian Romance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Eternal Love of Jesus Christ
reviews.reviewText: This is the story of life. All of us have failed. The Love of Jesus Christ redeems us and shows the path to “The Life to Come”. It is there for all who call on His Name!

What a beautiful , deep and lovely book. Although it’s a fiction, we can feel how God spoke to the writer to lead her to write about TRUTH. It has been a while since I read a book with so much eager and enthusiasm. I absolutely recommend this book!

reviews.reviewTitle: A M A Z I N G
reviews.reviewText: This book is Perfect in all its words. I loved it so much! Beautiful and powerful romance, cried so much
I first read this book back in high school and I loved it. I didn't have a copy of my own but now I do!! I highly recommend it. The print is great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this book, based on the book of Hosea. It really captured the love God (the husband)has for us (the prostitute). He has so much love for his children that no matter how many times we sin, he is faithful and forgiving and he takes us back time after time. This book illustrated this so well through the Michael Hosea and Angel. I couldn't put the book down and read it over 2 days.
